name: Cooking Scramble: World Master Chef & Food Fever
name_original: Cooking Scramble: World Master Chef & Food Fever
description:
“Cooking Scramble: Master Chef & Food Fever” for super star chefs who love cooking delicious meals, or just happen to love time-management games, "Cooking Scramble: World Master Chef & Food Fever" is the perfect kitchen frenzy restaurant simulation game for you. Why wait? Begin your Kitchen Story in this fun time management cooking game and leave your cooking tales to be told over and over among friends & family. Start with a single restaurant and grow into a multi location restaurant empire. You are on your way to becoming a restaurant tycoon.

Download the best Cooking game now. Become a world renowned master chef

Features
• Restaurant simulation game with vivid graphics and funky characters
• 70 challenging levels to complete in order to become the ultimate restaurant tycoon
• Super star chef serving quirky, friendly and crazy customers
• Unlock 7 new & exciting restaurants and explore new recipes for a wonderful dinner
• Share your scores & cooking tales on Facebook

“Cooking Scramble: Master Chef & Food Fever” gives exhilarating restaurant mania and kitchen fever to both the rookie gamer or seasoned fast food gamers alike. Your goal is to build a restaurant empire by taking as many orders of Tasty recipes; as fast as you can and serving the correct dishes even faster. “Cooking Scramble: Master Chef & Food Fever” is a must play for you. Super Spiced up Best cooking game to give FAST-PACED, cooking fever FUN in the all new cooking simulation game especially designed for the every season.

“Cooking Scramble: Master Chef & Food Fever” is the best time management game which will give you good practice if you want scramble in the kitchen; making awesome dinners and become a restaurant tycoon. "Cooking Scramble: World Master Chef & Food Fever" is a frenzy restaurant mania which will test your time management in the kitchen dash. The ultimate goal is to make you a world master chef who can own the cooking fever. You’ll need to satisfy every customer, serve the correct order of the Delicious recipes or Yummy drinks in time and create new cooking tales to remember. Otherwise, they could be annoying and impatient with your slow action and even leave the restaurant right away, shattering your dream of becoming a super star chef.

Enjoy “Cooking Scramble: Master Chef & Food Fever” Fun Restaurant Simulation Game! Dominate the World Culinary scene with your restaurant management & unique kitchen stories!
